name: Ancelman on Rails - Run from the Night
name_original: Ancelman on Rails - Run from the Night
description:
Made in under 24 hours for the Pineapple Jam 3, a 72 hous game jam.

I started to make the sprite for Ancelman here using a handcar and just had to use him in something, so I made this little prototype.

How to play: use the left and right arrow keys to accelerate Ancelman. Catch the DR icon, and stay away from the darkness deep inside of you night. 

The game can be played on browser, but I recomend to download for better performance.
